plot: With a satirical wink at the romance of cinematic ennui, Hotel Congress, is a funny and tender story of true love told through infidelity. A romantic film for the unromantic.
title: Hotel Congress
plot_es: With a satirical wink at the romance of cinematic ennui, Hotel Congress, is a funny and tender story of true love told through infidelity. A romantic film for the unromantic.
plot_en: With a satirical wink at the romance of cinematic ennui, Hotel Congress, is a funny and tender story of true love told through infidelity. A romantic film for the unromantic.
